<script type="text/javascript">
	function submitQuery() {        
		window.location = '/search.aspx?q=' + encodeURIComponent($('#search').val());
		return false;
	}
	$(document).on('keypress', '#search', function(event) {
		if (event.which == 13) {
			event.preventDefault();
			window.location = '/search.aspx?q=' + encodeURIComponent($('#search').val());
		}
	});
	$(document).on('keypress', '#uiTxtPassword', function(event) {
		if (event.which == 13) {
			event.preventDefault();
			__doPostBack('ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$uiUCImageLibrary$uiLnlLogin','');
		}
	});
</script>
